title: Spicy Math
description: Enter the world of Crystal Meyers.  She’s just a typical college freshman — nights are spent having fun, but during the day, she drags herself to suffer in lectures.  When she asks the cute boy in class for homework help, she gets much more than she has asked for...   Get ready for a sweet and hot ride. Because that boy has had his eyes on Crystal for a while and has some things in mind…  Spicy Math is the first erotic short story in the Crystal Joy series. Warning: contains erotic scenes and adult language.
author: Celia Fay
